full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

**Federal Government of Canada**
**Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)**

## Request for Proposal: DC Power Supply System

The Department of National Defence (DND) has issued a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the design, fabrication and delivery of a DC Power Supply system.

**Tender Details:**

* **Tender Reference Number:** WS3630343075
* **Tender Closing Date:** November 30, 2022, 14:00:00
* **Publication Date:** November 15, 2022
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** December 1, 2022
* **Expected Contract End Date:** March 29, 2024

**Key Selection Criteria:**

* Lowest Price

**Compliance with Trade Agreements:**

This tender announcement is open to bidders who comply with the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)

**Region of Delivery:**

* British Columbia, Canada

**Contracting Authority:**

Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5

**Contact Information:**

Jason Smith
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
jason.smith@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

## Tender Description:

The DND has a requirement for the design, fabrication and delivery of a DC Power Supply system.

You can find the complete tender announcement and supporting documents [here](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14643335?extsite=MTQ2NDMzMzVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).

Note: The rewritten entry is in markdown format with a bullet point list and headings for easier
